title: Players seem to lag around me
body:
Hello riot, 

I was just playing a normal game playing zed {{champion:238}} and the opposing players started to tell me that they seem to have high frame rate drop when I'm near them. I was using the non updated client and I have absolutely no idea what's going on. This just started happening today and the players think I'm DDos'ing them. Please help!

replies.body: Did this happen in more than a single match or was this a one-time occurrence?
